name: Goobit
description:
A small game I made to learn Unity.

Play as Goobit, a little slime on a grand adventure to become the very best next Finsterking and rule over all the other monsters with an iron a gooey fist!
Recruit and train up to three other monsters on your way to the mainland where the competition for the title of Finsterking is held...if only that darned boat would show up!

CONTROLS
Movement
ARROW KEYS, WASD-Keys
Interact, Confirm
SPACE, Mouse Left-Click
Open Menu, Back
ESC, Mouse Right-Click

Note: The menu can only be navigated with a mouse.

The game contains the starter island with 12 monsters to find, recruit and train and is about 30 - 60 minutes long. For now I'm glad to be done with this, but a time will come when I'll make a "complete" version
